name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RentCopilot - Display monthly and weekly rent

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RentCopilot automatically displays monthly rent next to weekly rent, and vice versa!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Any new rent information is added seamlessly into to the page using the page's formatting!

RentCopilot can be toggled on/off at any time using its action button. Toggling it off will simply undo the changes it made to the page!
